nodes.bodyText: Should this be a list of traits instead? All the ByTag transformers take lists, for reference.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -287,6 +287,47 @@ the :ref:`tags trait <tags-trait>`.
     This transformer does not remove shapes from the prelude.
 
 
+.. _excludeShapesByTrait-transform:
+
+excludeShapesByTrait
+--------------------
+
+Removes shapes if they are marked with a specific trait.
+
+.. list-table::
+    :header-rows: 1
+    :widths: 10 20 70
+
+    * - Property
+      - Type
+      - Description
+    * - trait
+      - ``string``

@@ -287,6 +287,47 @@ the :ref:`tags trait <tags-trait>`.
